definitions.body: completeness, fullness : [[כְּתֻמָּם]] Is 47:9 acc. to their full measure; [[בְּעֶחֶם תֻּמּוֹ]] Job 21:23 in his very completeness.
innocence, simplicity: [[הלכים]] [[לתמם]] 2Sa 15:11; [[מֶשַׁךְ בַּקֶּשֶׁת לְתֻמּוֹ]] 1Ki 22:34 = 2Ch 18:33, i.e. without definite aim.

[[תֻּמִּים]] in [[אוּרִים וְתֻמִּים]] (mng. dub., v., [[אורים]]) De 33:8, Ex 28:30 (P) Le 8:8 (P), Ezr 2:63 = Ne 7:65; + 1Sa 14:41 (for [[תָּמִים]]) We Dr Bu HPS; also Ho 3:4 (for [[תרפים]] Che:JQ. July 1899, 564 and Ho 4:5 ([[תֻּמֶָּיךָ]] for [[אִמֶָּךָ]]) Ruben:JQ. April 1899, 44 Che:l. c.
